root: ^Friend: First, you can have glasses-wearing girls take them off and suddenly become beautiful, or have girls wearing glasses flashing those cute grins...
^Fubuki: ...or have girls stealing the protagonist's glasses and putting them on like, "Haha, got your glasses!'
^Friend: That's just way too cute! Also, boys with glasses!
^Fubuki: I really like when their glasses have that suspicious looking gleam, and it's amazing how it can look really cool or just be a joke.
^Friend: I really like how it can fulfill all those abstract needs.
^Fubuki: Being able to switch up the styles and colors of glasses based on your mood is a lot of fun too!
^Friend: It's actually so much fun! You have those half rim glasses, or the thick frame glasses, everything!
^Fubuki: It's like you're enjoying all these kinds of glasses at a buffet.
^Friend: I really want Luna to try some on or Marine to try some on to replace her eyepatch.
^Fubuki: We really need glasses to become a thing in hololive and start selling them for HoloComi.
^Friend: Don't. You. Think. We. Really. Need. To. Officially. Give. Everyone. Glasses?
